property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in Holy level 3, War level 2, and all Holy Creatures. Dark Spells cost triple.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Abilities Valor When the Paladin melee attacks and damages the strongest enemy creature, he gains 1 Valor Token. Divine Auras As a quick spell, the Paladin may gain an aura of his choice. Each aura has its own cost in Valor Tokens. See, sheet for details on Auras. Chivalrous Challenge During the Upkeep Phase, the Paladin may place his Challenge Token on the strongest Enemy creature or Opposing Mage. Once per attack, the Paladin and Challenged creature may reroll any number of their attack dice while attacking each other. If the Challenged creature attacks any other object they roll 2 less dice, to a minimum of 1.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained in the Water school, as well as drowned and song spells.

property.name: MageAbilities
property.value: Abilities: Siren's Call: As a Psychic Song quick spell the Siren may pay 1 mana to place her Siren's Call marker on target non-Mage creature within 2 zones. On its action phase that creature MUST move at least 1 zone closer to the Siren, if possible, and may not attack her. Discard the marker after their action phase. Friendly aquatic creatures also gain Melee +2 while they have the Siren's Call marker. Fermata As a quick spell, the Siren may add a dissipate token to a song she controls by paying mana equal to its level.#xD; Amphibious The Siren gains Regenerate 1 while in water zones.

property.name: Text
property.value: Divine Lance gains 1 attack Divine Lance gains 1 attack die and increase its mana cost by 1 for each copy of this card in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Tsunami is cast, choose a direction. After the attack resolves repeat the attack one zone further away in the chosen direction. This continues until there are no further zones.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Flying creatures entering this zone are attacked by Venomous Spines. Aquatic creatures are immune to Venomous Spines if there is a Water terrain attached to this zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-flame ranged attacks roll 2 less dice (to a minimum of 1) against Crusade Banner. During the Upkeep Phase add a crusade token to Crusade Banner. During the Deployment Phase you may choose up to 2 Holy creatures from your spellbook and summon them to this zone, reducing their costs by 1 for each crusade token. If you do, destroy Crusade Banner.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a creature you control is attacked and damaged by an opponent's creature, place a Crusade token on Crusader's Temple. Once during the Upkeep Phase you may remove 3 crusade tokens to give all holy creatures, in the arena, Melee +1 this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Initiative, all drowned and pirate creatures gain Melee + 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Pillar of Flame is cast or removes a dissipate counter, it attacks an enemy creature in its zone with Holy Fire. When an enemy creature enters this zone, it is attacked with Holy Fire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whirlpool may only target a zone with a Water terrain. All non-Flying, non-aquatic creatures in this zone gain the Restrained and Unmovable traits. During the Upkeep Phase, non-Flying non-aquatic creatures receive 2 direct damage

property.name: Text
property.value: Creatures may be Pushed through the Chasm as though it did not have the Passage Blocked trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Veil of Saints does not block LoS for Holy creatures or Mages trained in the Holy school.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-flying objects in this zone have the Obscured trait. Non-Flying, non-animal creatures in this zone are hindered and their attacks roll 2 fewer attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Demon creatures in this zone gain Regenerate 1. All non-Flying and non-Demon creatures in this zone, are hindered, and receive 1 point of direct flame damage during the Upkeep Phase. Hydro attacks gain the Ethereal trait against Hellfire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Flying Non-aquatic creatures in this zone roll 1 less die when making non-spell attacks. Aquatic creatures in this zone gain Melee + 1

property.name: Text
property.value: LoS which passes through two sides of this zone is blocked. All non-Flying creatures in this zone gain the Ranged +1 trait. Non-Flying creatures require a full action to move into this zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-Flying, non-aquatic creatures in this zone have the Slow and Unmovable traits, and lose (and cannot gain) the Elusive trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy creature receives a Daze or Stun condition marker from a light attack, they also receive 2 direct light damage. Do not ready Alfiya, during the Ready Phase. Once per round, a cleric you control may spend a full action to pray and ready Alfiya.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Archelon is attacked, during the Avoid Attack step you may place a Stun condition marker on him. If you do, he gains the Resilient trait until the end of the round.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Guided Spear: [Full] [Ranged:1-2] [Light] [Dice=4] [d12] [5+ = Daze] [Ethereal] [Unavoidable] [+2 Vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: When making ranged attacks Artemis ignores the Obscured trait

property.name: Text
property.value: Friendly Drowned creatures in this zone reconstruct 2 damage during the Upkeep Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of the Blue Knight's activation you may pay up to 4 mana, if you do he gains Melee +1 and +1 to his effect rolls for each Token spent, until the end of his activation.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Aegis 1, Familiar, Flying, Legendary, Holy Mage Only

property.name: Text
property.value: Cassiel can only cast Healing and Protection Spells.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Grabbing Claw: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=2] [d12] [7+ = Grapple] Double Claw Crush: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=4]

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase any creature Colossal Crab has grappled, receives 2 direct damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Dawnbreaker's Initiate would be destroyed by an opponents attack or effect, before it is destroyed you may teleport your Mage or a Holy creature you control to this zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Dawnbreaker's Martyr is destroyed, heal a living creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a creature in this zone has a Bleed condition, Razor Claws gain the Doublestrike trait

property.name: Text
property.value: Friendly living creatures in this zone gain the Regenerate 2 trait.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Wrenching Claws: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=2] [d12] [5+ = Grapple] Tail Spike: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=4] [Piercing +2] [+2 vs. Grappled]

property.name: Text
property.value: As a Full action, Giant Snake may add a Suffocation counter (Life -2) to a creature it's grappled. If the grapple is broken all Suffocation counters are removed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, when making a counterstrike, Eligor gains the Melee +2 trait and Martial Strike gains the Piercing +1 trait.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Avaricious Strike: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=4] [Piercing +1 per Gold token on Gerard]

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, and when Gerard attacks and damages an enemy creature, he gains 1 Gold token. Your Mage may spend Gold tokens as mana when he summons Soldier or Pirate creatures.

property.name: Text
property.value: As a Full action, Giant Snake may add a Suffocation counter (Life -2) to a creature it's grappled. If the grapple is broken all Suffocation counters are removed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knight of the Red Helm gains Melee +2 when attacking the Strongest enemy creature. (Strongest creature is the highest mana cost.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Koragg can only attach to a Warlord. While attached the Warlord gains Armor +1 and Melee +1

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Tentacle Grasp: [Quick] [Ranged: 0-1] [Dice=3] [d12] [5+ = Grapple & Snatch] Devouring Beak: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=6] [Piercing +3]

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Ray of Light: [Full] [Ranged:1-1] [Light] [Dice=3] [d12] [7-10 = Daze; 11+ = Stun] [Ethereal] Hand of Light: [Quick] [Melee] [Light] [Dice=3] [d12] [7+ = Daze] [Ethereal]

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase all restrained or incapacitated creatures in this zone receive a Suffocation Token. Each Suffocation Token is Life -2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friendly Living Creatures in the same zone as Mathias are immune to the damage and effects of attack spells.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Aegis 1, Flying, Melee +X, Regenerate X, Legendary

property.name: Text
property.value: X = the number of friendly temple conjurations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Naiya can cast only non-creature Water spells or song spells. While Naiya is in a zone with a Water terrain she gains Armor +1 and Channeling +1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pegasus may only be attached to a Paladin. While attached the Paladin gains Charge +2

property.name: Stats
property.value: Defense=4+ inf No Ranged, Armor=0, Life=8

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Martial Arts: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=3] [Discard all Melee +1 Tokens tokens on Radiant Fist] Meditation [Full] [This creature gains 2 Melee +1 tokens]

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Mage is attacked and damaged by an opponent's creature, if Raziel is in your Mage's zone, he gains a Melee +1 token.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Acid Immunity, Nonliving, Resilient, Psychic Immunity, Uncontainable

property.name: Text
property.value: If Rust Ooze attacks and damages a Mage, you may pay X mana to destroy an equipment attached to that mage. X = the equipment's mana cost.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Quick Snap: [Quick] [Melee] [Dice=3] [d12] [5+ = Grapple] Death Roll: [Full] [Melee] [Dice=5] [d12] [4+ = Bleed] [Can only Target Grappled Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Initiative, Shoalsdeep Tidecaller gains the Melee +2 trait, and adds +4 to Riptide effect rolls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Burn conditions on enemy creatures in this zone, are not removed during the Upkeep Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spirit of Saint Siegfried ignores the Ethereal trait on non-light attacks. His mana cost is reduced by 3 for each Valor token you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Squire can only cast equipment spells. Equipment he casts cost 1 less mana. As a Quick Action, he may attach your Mage to a legal mount, if they are both in his zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Swamp Stalker is in a zone with Swamp terrain, he gains the Obscured and Elusive Traits.

property.name: Text
property.value: When guarding, Temple High Guard gains Melee +2 and may counterstrike first (the Counterstrike Step is moved to just after the Declare Attack Step).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Burnproof, Frost +3, Hydro Immunity, Nonliving, Resilient, Unstoppable

property.name: Text
property.value: During Wetland Titan Frog's activation is gains Flying while moving and automatically escapes any Grapples.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature attacks a creature that has attacked and damaged a friendly creature or holy conjuration, they gain Melee +2 and Piercing +2 for that attack, then destroy Avenging Blow.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature attacks and damages an object, you must reveal Blind. When this creature attacks, during the Roll to Miss step, a d12. If it rolls a 6 or less, the attack misses.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase all enemy creatures in this zone receive 1 direct light damage. Friendly creatures in this zone gain the Regenerate 1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Creature gains the Life -2 trait for each Suffocation token on Drown. During the Upkeep Phase, Drown gains 1 Suffocation token. X = the number of Suffocation tokens

property.name: Text
property.value: Eye for an Eye can only be revealed directly after the Damage and Effects step. If this creature is attacking, you must reveal Eye for an Eye, it suffers the same damage and effects as the defender. Then, destroy Eye for an Eye.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Galvanize is revealed, remove a condition marker with a cost of X from this creature. If you do, then place a Retribution Token on them. Then, Destroy Galvanize. (Retribution Tokens give Melee +1.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When you remove a dissipate counter from Healing Refrain, heal all friendly living creatures in this zone 1 damage. If it is the last disspate counter, heal 2 damage instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains Charge +2 and Fast. [Charge +2] [Fast]

property.name: Text
property.value: When an enemy creature enters this zone, Hydrothermal Vent must be revealed. Make the above attack, then destroy Hydrothermal Vent. The reveal cost is lowered by one if enchanting a Water zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains Aegis 2 and Tough -3 traits. [Aegis 2] [Tough -2]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains Melee +2 and its attacks gain Piercing +1, while attacking the strongest enemy creature. (Strongest creature is the one with the highest mana cost.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Upkeep Phase, the controller of Life Link may heal up to 3 damage from this creature and place it on himself as direct damage, regardless of distance or LoS.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, roll the effect die. On a 7+ this creature gains a Stun Condition, if not they gain a Daze Condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature deals damage, it receives 1 direct light damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Song of Hate is revealed, place a Hate token on one of your creatures. During its activation this creature must melee attack a creature with a Hate token. If it cannot, then it must move towards a creature with a Hate token, if possible. Song of Hate cannot be revealed during an Action Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Song of Love cannot be revealed during an Action Phase. When Song of Love is revealed, place a Love token on a friendly creature. This creature cannot make a melee or ranged attack against a creature with a Love token. X = Creature's level -1

property.name: Text
property.value: Enchanted creature gains Armor +1 and Melee +1 for each enemy creature in his zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the round, if your challenged Enemy hasnot attacked your Mage this round, gain 1 valor. Once per round, when you attack your challenged Enemy, gain 1 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: Equipment objects in this Mage's Weapon and Shield slots cannot be destroyed by opponent'ss effects. When Champion Gauntlets would be destroyed by a spell or ability an opponent controls, prevent that destruction unless that opponent pays 2 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Mage gains a Defense and the Intercept trait. When this Mage intercepts an attack, gain 1 Valor. [Defense 7+ 1x]

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Mage is Mounted, this weapon rolls 3 additional attack dice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a non-Mage friendly creature in your zone is attacked and damaged, you may pay 1 mana, if you do the attacker receives 1 direct light damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2 and the Hydro -2 trait. [Armor +2] [Hydro -2]

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Mage attacks and destroys an enemy creature, place a Melee +1 token on a friendly non-mage creature without one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mage gains Armor +2. When you cast a healing incantation, Heal this mage 1 damage. [Armor +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever a spell cast by this Mage, or an enchantment controlled by this Mage, provides healing for an object, other than the Regenerate trait, he may increase that amount of healing by one. He may use this ability once per round. If he heals multiple objects (such as with a Group Heal), he only get the +1 bonus for one object of his choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have Initiative, your Mage gains +2 on effect rolls and the Melee +1 and Ranged +1 traits when making hydro attacks.

property.name: AttackBar
property.value: Radiant Slash: [Quick] [Melee] [Light] [Dice=4] [d12] [7-12 = Daze; 13+ = Stun] [Ethereal] [+2 vs. Nonliving Creatures]

property.name: Text
property.value: When you declare an attack with Radiant Slash, you may spend a Valor Token to add 3 to your effect roll. When the Radiant Slash deals 5 or more damage, gain 1 Valor Token.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control 4 of more Water Terrain Spells, Triton's Horn gains Channeling +1. During the Deployment Phase, Triton's Horn may Summon one Water creature. If Triton's Horn would be destroyed by a spell or effect an opponent controls, prevent that destruction unless that opponent pays 2 mana per Water Terrain you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, this Mage may pay 1 less mana when she casts of reveals a song spell. When you reveal a song spell, you may pay mana equal to its level to place an extra dissipate token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remove up to 5 damage from target creature and place it on the caster of this spell. (This is not affected by Finite Life.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature is Teleported to a target zone up to one zone away.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target creature heals the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. Then, heal target creature within 1 zone of the first creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. Then, heal target creature withing 1 zone of the second creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. A creature can only be targeted by this spell once in a casting.

property.name: Text
property.value: Overextend can only target an inactive creature. Flip the creature's action marker face-up. After that creature's next activation, it gains a Stun condition. Only one Overextend can be cast on a creature, each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may discard up to 5 Valor Tokens. Your next melee attack this round, gains Melee +X and Piercing +X. X is the number of Valor Tokens discarded to cast this spell. During the Upkeep Phase you may spend 2 Valor Tokens to return Smite from your discard pile to your spellbook.
